# addAction(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an action to the action set.

## Declaration

```swift
func addAction(_ action: HMAction, completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func addAction(_ action: HMAction) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **action**: The action to add. Actions may only be in one setâ€”create separate [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAction] objects for the same conceptual action if you want an action to be in more than one action set.
- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Defining the associated actions

- **actions**: Set of actions in the action set.
- **removeAction(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes an action from the action set.
- **HMCharacteristicWriteAction**: An action in an action set that writes a value to a characteristic.
- **HMAction**: An abstract base class for actions in HomeKit.
